screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .mmmp file in Corel MindManager 22
screenshot.caption: MMMP file open in Corel MindManager 22

description: A MindManager mind map comprises a main topic, subtopics, notes, boundaries, relationship lines, images, and other objects. You can use the maps (typically .MMAP files) to organize information in various layouts, such as flowcharts, timelines, meetings, events, and project management plans.

MindManager map parts are topic or subtopic components you can reuse in different maps. Since you can reuse the parts in different types of maps, MMMP files typically store generic information, such as units of time (days or months) or basic meeting agenda items.
To create an MMMP file to store a map part:
NOTE: Corel Corporation acquired MindManager from Mindjet in 2016.
